remarks: The first ` N ` derivatives of the Taylor polynomial at ` B ` match the derivatives of the function from which it is derived.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Jan-2017.)
statement:
dvntaylp0.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvntaylp0.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> CC ) $.
dvntaylp0.a $e |- ( ph -> A C_ S ) $.
dvntaylp0.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. ( 0 ... N ) ) $.
dvntaylp0.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. dom ( ( S Dn F ) ` N ) ) $.
dvntaylp0.t $e |- T = ( N ( S Tayl F ) B ) $.
dvntaylp0 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ( CC Dn T ) ` M ) ` B ) = ( ( ( S Dn F ) ` M ) ` B ) ) $.
